data.title: Laptops (Design Software)
data.meta_description: New to patrons of the Loveland Public Library! Lenovo ThinkPad laptops are available to check out. Check out is limited to Loveland Public Library patrons only. Here are a few guidelines:  1. Once a hold notice is received, patrons will have 48 hours to pick up the laptop. -- 2.  Laptops check out for 7 days. -- 3. If not returned within 3 days after due date, patron will be charged for the full replacement value of the laptop and accompanying equipment. -- 4. Cardholders checking out laptops are responsible for the care and return of the items. Patrons will be asked to reveiw and sign acknowledgement of liability. -- 5.  Laptops do not renew. -- 6. Available only to patrons over the age of 18.

Cardholders checking out laptops are responsible for the care and return of the items. Patrons will be asked to reveiw and sign acknowledgement of liability. -- 5. Laptops do not renew. -- 6.
